item.title: Percona Database Distributions - An Overview
item.description: In this presentation, Lenz is providing an overview and update about Percona’s database distributions for MongoDB, MySQL and PostgreSQL. Attendees will learn more about Percona’s role in the open source database ecosystems and how Percona’s database distributions help to solve common production use cases. The talk will also go over the most notable feature highlights that have been added to the distributions lately.
